sen.j: 元弘3年（1333年）に太田守延に奉じられ、千種忠顕らとともに足利尊氏の六波羅探題攻撃に参加する。
sen.e: In 1333 the Prince was asked by Morinobu OTA to fight, he joined in together with Tadaaki CHIKUSA, to the attack of Rokuhara Tandai; the Kamakura shogunate's agents stationed in Rokuhara, Kyoto, which was organized by Takauji ASHIKAGA.

sen.j: 幕府が滅亡し建武の新政が始まると、阿野廉子が産んだ皇子の中で最年長であった恒良は建武元年（1334年）に皇太子に指名される。

sen.j: 足利尊氏が新政から離反し、建武3年（1336年）の湊川の戦いに勝利して京都へ迫ると、比叡山に逃れていた恒良は後醍醐天皇から皇位と三種の神器を譲られ、異母兄の尊良親王とともに新田義貞・新田義顕父子に奉じられて北陸地方統治を名目に越前国金ヶ崎城（福井県敦賀市）に下向する。
sen.e: When Takauji ASHIKAGA defected from the new restoration and he attacked Kyoto after he won from the Battle of Minatogawa, the Prince Tsuneyoshi/Tsunenaga who escaped to Hiei-zan Mountain, was given the Imperial rank and three sacred emblems of the Imperial Family, he was asked by the father and son, Yoshisada NITTA and Yoshiaki NITTA, he went to Kanegasaki-jo Castle in Echizen province (Tsuruga City, Fukui Prefecture), together with Imperial Prince Takayoshi/Takanaga who was half older brother, under the pretext of ruling Hokuriku district,

sen.e: On the following year, the castle fell after being lost by Shikaga force led by Ko no Moroyasu and Takatsune SHIBA, Yoshimasa escaped but Imperial Prince Takayoshi/Takanaga and Yoshiaki killed themselves, Imperial Prince Tsuneyoshi/Tsunenaga was caught and sentenced to Kyoto.

sen.j: 『太平記』では弟の成良親王らとともに花山院第に幽閉され毒殺されたと伝えられる。
sen.e: According to "Taiheiki; the Record of Great Peace" it is said the prince was confined with his younger brother, Imperial Prince Nariyoshi/Narinaga in Kazan in dai (residence) and killed by the poison.
